Original:
被歸類在愛店，已二訪
裝潢漂亮，有氛圍感，非常適合拍照（店內風格偏暗）
居然是很支持帶蛋糕去慶生這點蠻稀有的
服務人員很親切又讓人不會有壓力

本來以為是只著重在調酒的店，沒想到食物也好好吃⋯主食選項沒很多，但我們有點到的餐點擺盤都好美又好吃

喝朋友的哈密瓜調酒（好像是新品第一次來沒看到），本來怕酒感會很濃+有藥水感，結果完全不會⋯是清甜+完全像吃到品質很好的哈密瓜本瓜🥹好像沒在別的店家見過這樣的飲品！不愛喝酒的朋友們都覺得好好喝

會為了哈密瓜🍈調酒跟干貝燉飯回訪

建議先訂位，然後有拍照需求的話先告知店家想要的位子

Classified in Aidian, I have visited the second visit
The decoration is beautiful and has a sense of atmosphere, which is very suitable for taking pictures (the style of the store is dark)
It's really supported by cakes to celebrate the birthday.
The service staff is very kind and makes people feel stressed

I thought it was a shop that was only focused on bartending. I did not expect that the food was delicious. There were not many staple food options, but the meals we had a little arrived were beautiful and delicious.

Drinking a friend's cantaloupe banncing (it seems that the new product has not seen it for the first time). I was afraid that the wine would be strong+a potion, and the result would not be sweet+it was completely like a good cantaloupe. Guayan seems to have never seen such a drink in other shops!Friends who don't like drinking all feel good

Will return for cantaloupe to bartender and scallop stew back to visit

It is recommended to order the seat first, and then if there is a need to take a picture, first inform the store you want the seat

Original:
1. 備料嚴重不足
六點開門，六點半就說沒有披薩了，因為「前面的客人都點完了」。除非前面的客人都是大胃王，不然這表示店家備料不足，沒有做到開餐廳的基礎。

2. 上菜速度極慢
等了一個小時才上一盤燉飯，再等半小時多才上了另外三盤燉飯，再約二十分鐘才上到最後兩盤麵，不說還以為有飢餓三十的聯名活動。

3. 料理技術亟待加強
蟹黃海鮮義大利麵的醬汁非常稀，而且沒有蟹黃味。麵煮得太軟，而且底下都是湯，跟巷口的海鮮炒麵差不多。
連做義大利麵最基本的醬汁乳化都做不好，建議收一收別做了比較好。
這盤要$480，但做得還不如高職餐飲科學生煮的菜。

燉飯的收汁也沒做好，尤其上面還有水波蛋，拌開吃變得更稀，像吃稀飯一樣。
EN:
1. Seriously insufficient materials
Opening the door at 6 o'clock, there was no pizza at 6:30, because "the guests in front were finished."Unless the guests in front are the big stomach king, otherwise it means that the store has insufficient materials and does not have the foundation of opening a restaurant.

2. The speed of serving is extremely slow
After waiting for an hour before going to a plate of stew, I waited for more than half an hour before I went to the other three plates of stewed rice. It was about 20 minutes to go to the last two plates.

3. Cooking technology needs to be strengthened urgently
The sauce of crab yellow seafood is very sparse, and there is no yellow flavor of crab.The noodles are too soft, and the bottom is soup, which is similar to the seafood fried noodles in the alley.
Even the most basic sauce of the Italian noodles will not be done well. It is recommended to get a certificate.
This set is $ 480, but it is not as cooked by the high -vocational dining science students.

The juice of stewed rice is not ready, especially water wave eggs on it.

Original:
18:00營業，訂位20:30。
主餐只剩一個燉飯、兩個義大利麵可選。
22:20才陸續上餐，等待接近兩小時。

好不好吃很主觀，但想跟路過正在觀望的客人說：
等待兩小時的披薩皮很硬、
薯條炸的過脆、
辣蟹海鮮義大利麵不要點。

---

不想讓店家顛倒是非，還是把詳細經過寫上來。

我們準時20:30入座、點餐。
餐點直到22:20，接近兩小時的等待時間才陸續上桌。
期間向店員反應，店員只簡單回應「再等一下」，完全沒打算主動告知會延遲出餐。

等待出餐過程中，發現隔壁桌有精心裝飾的飲料。
詢問店員該餐點品項名稱，並表明我們也想點。
店員則表示「稍後會來統計數量」。
結果到最後都沒有來確認，直到我們再次詢問。
店家卻回答「如果要的話要再等半小時喔，你們還要嗎？」
先前已經等待接近兩小時，聽到還要再等半小時，
還真的是不想再勞煩店家幫我們準備了。

餐點等待兩小時，但店家完全沒感到抱歉。
直到我們再次反應等太久，才表示免服務費及餐點九折。
這裡不想討論等待接近兩小時的補償方式是否過於廉價，
但在結帳時卻想以原價收費。
如果那麼不願意為你們的疏失負責，當初就不要提出這個補償方案。
最終搞得很像是苦等兩小時的客人在斤斤計較。

雖然餐廳裝潢精緻、好打卡，
但還是希望餐廳能先重視一下客人的用餐體驗。

祝生意興隆。
EN:
Open at 18:00, booking at 20:30.
There is only one stew and two pasta for the main meal.
22:20 will be served one after another, waiting for nearly two hours.

It ’s very subjective, but I want to say to the guests who are watching passing by:
Waiting for two hours of pizza is hard,
French fried fried too crispy,
Do not order spicy crab seafood pasta.

---

Do not want the store to reverse the right and wrong, or write the details.

We will take a seat and order at 20:30 on time.
The meal was not on the table until 22:20, the waiting time for nearly two hours.
During this period, the clerk only responded to "waiting for" simply, and did not intend to inform the meal at all.

Waiting for meals, I found that there are carefully decorative drinks next door.
Ask the clerk the name of the meal item and show that we also want to order.
The clerk said that "the number will be counted later."
As a result, we did not confirm in the end until we asked again.
The store replied, "If you want it, wait half an hour, do you want it?"
I have been waiting for nearly two hours before, and I have to wait half an hour when I hear it.
I really don't want to worry about the store to help us prepare.

The meal was waiting for two hours, but the store was not sorry at all.
It wasn't until we responded for too long that the service fee and meals were 10 % off.
I don’t want to discuss whether the compensation method waiting for nearly two hours is too cheap,
But at the checkout, I wanted to charge it at the original price.
If you are not willing to be responsible for your negligence, do not propose this compensation plan.
In the end, the guests who waited for two hours to care about it.

Although the restaurant is exquisite and easy to check in,
But I still hope that the restaurant can first pay attention to the guest's dining experience.

I wish the business a prosperous.
